DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center, randomized controlled study aims to evaluate the efficacy of Cilostazol versus Aspirin for primary prevention of atherosclerotic events with Korean type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (DM) patients.
DOC.brief_title: Cilostazol Versus Aspirin for Primary Prevention of Atherosclerotic Events
